name: ML engineer (ML-driven Java code optimization of Android apps)
description:
Responsibilities:

  • Research and implement ML algorithms to process Java bytecode
  • Research code features extraction
  • Decide on the ML solution architecture and training set
  • Research performance issues of ML algorithms implementation
  • Analysis of competitive ML solutions

Requirements:

  • BA/BS in Applied Mathematics, Applied Statistics, Computer Science or similar
  • 3 years of practical experience with common Neural Network / Deep Learning platforms (Tensorflow, PyTorch/Caffe2) in a production environment
  • Able to work in a team of non-ML engineers (be ready to setup goals and do work breakdown regarding ML part of the project)
  • Understanding and hands-on experience with “classic” Machine Learning (k-NN, Naïve Bayes, SVM, decision forests, etc.) and genetic ML algorithms
  • Experience with NLP technics (embedding, word2vec, bag-of-words, etc.)
  • Basic knowledge of C/C++ or Java
  • Knowledge of data structures and algorithms complexity
  • English (to write documentation and communicate by email)

Desired Skills:

  • Knowledge and experience in structured prediction (structured SVMs, graph neural networks, etc.)
  • Experience with NN-based NLP (LSTM, etc.)
  • Experience in SW development
  • Understanding of software design patterns
  • Understanding of compiler internals (e.g. LLVM) and code optimizations, experience with code parsers
  • Deep understanding of computer system architecture
  • Scientific background (PhD, patents, papers)

Work conditions:

  • Comfortable A-class office within 15 minute walking distance from Savelovskaya and Maryina Roscha metro stations (shuttle bus available)

  • Flexible working time

  • Competitive salary

  • Corporate lunches

  • Medical and life insurance

  • 7 paid sick leaves (without sick leave certificate)

  • Fitness room, shower, fitness compensation

  • Company compensates relocation and interview expenses
